I live in the United States. I _ to go on trips every year. I am sure there are some beautiful _ in the world.
If I can go to any place in the world, I think my first choice   is _ . It is a beautiful country. And I can _ kangaroos there. They can _ so high and so far. The second choice is Milan, a city of Italy. I love football and AC Milan is _ favorite team. They play very well. I think watching one of their games in Milan _ really wonderful.
The third choice is China, and I am _ Chinese. Chinese culture   is very different from our culture. I think it is very _ .
I think I will _ my bags to have a nice trip one day.
